description:
Unleash your inner snow adventurer with the ultimate blend of comfort and functionality. The fully opening rear zipper grants you access to the spacious main compartment, even with your snowboard strapped to the front. Nirvana 25 isn't just about top-notch performance; it's an eco-conscious trailblazer too. Crafted from entirely recycled materials, it not only thrills ski tourers and freeriders but also champions our planet's well-being.

  • Main fabric is made with durable recycled polyester with a PFC-free DWR finish for weather resistance
  • CONTACT U Frame™ with high density EVA back panel, hipbelt and shoulder straps for a comfortable carry
  • U-frame increases carrying comfort and load transfer with attached skis or snowboard
  • Internal hydration sleeve lets you add your own reservoir (sold separately)
  • Full rear zipper access to the main compartment
  • Moulded, soft-lined goggle compartment
  • Dedicated front pocket for avalanche safety equipment
  • Attachments for ice axe and trekking poles
  • Diagonal and A-frame ski carrying systems with attachment for vertical snowboard carry
  • SOS label with emergency instructions
name: Mammut Nirvana 25 Daypack - Unisex
